attributes.action: The British people demand the right for a Referendum on leaving the EU
attributes.additional_details:
With it now being almost 40 years since we last had any say in the UK's relationship with the EU I believe it is long overdue that the wishes of the UK population were heard again. There should be a simple referendum , legally binding on the government , asking 1 question :

"Should the UK remain part of the EU"

and a simple Yes or No

if 50.1% of the votes are in favour of leaving the EU then we should be taken out within 3 months by simply revoking ALL EU treaties and agreements.
